properties.title: testing web services soapUI site updates

section.name: Site Updates
section.p: This page will list notable updates made to documents on the soapui.org web site

subsection.p: The soapUI site has been totally overhauled for the 1.6 beta1 release... most pages have updated content..

tr.td: Added info for new snapshot version
Updated info on running tests on JBoss versions in the last paragraph
Overview of all keyboard shortcuts available in soapUI 1.5
Feature and performance comparison with Apache's JMeter tool
Shows how to use soapUI together with at scheduling tool for both functional and load surveillance testing of web services
Shows how to use Groovy Script Steps to run a TestCase repeatedly for a list of input data
Added information on assertion logging and detail viewers
